accountFromPubkey(bytes).details: the address is the last 20 bytes of the keccak256 of the address

checkBitcoinSig(bytes,bytes,bytes32,uint.details: does this my verifying the p2wpkh matches an ethereum account
checkBitcoinSig(bytes,bytes,bytes32,uint.return: true if signature is valid, else false

checkSig(bytes,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,byt.details: does this using ecrecover because Ethereum has no soul

params._pubkey: the public key to check (64 bytes)

params._inputValue: the value of the input in satoshi
params._outputValue: the value of the output in satoshi

oneInputOneOutputSighash(bytes,bytes20,b.notice: calculates the signature hash of a Bitcoin transaction with the provided details
